text: Ware wa ningen ni, ryoshin ni taishite shinsetsu ni suru yo meijita.Daga moshi kare-ra (ryoshin) ga, anata ni taishi nandaka wakaranai mono o ware ni haisuru yo ni shiirunaraba, kare-ra ni shitagatte wa naranai. Anata gata wa (mina) ware no moto ni kaeru. Sonotoki ware wa, anata gata no okonatta koto o tsugerudearou
